DOC.brief_summary: This safety efficacy study Dexamethasone Drug Delivery System anterior segment inflammation pain follow cataract extraction lens implantation .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Dexamethasone Drug Delivery System Postoperative Inflammation Pain After Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Planned single cataract extraction lens implant Bestcorrected visual acuity 20/200 good opposite eye Glaucoma history intraocular hypertension study eye History chronic ocular allergy last year require treatment Scheduled cataract surgery nonstudy eye study participation
